content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Good afternoon, Emilia. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. The rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is negotiable, but I am looking for the highest possible price. What is your budget for renting a 25 square meter apartment in Munich?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.

I agree to the price of 500 Euro per month.

TERMINATE.

Thank you for your time.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Emilia. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I am afraid that the rental price of 500 Euro per month is not feasible for me as a landlord. I would be looking for a rental price closer to 700 Euro per month to maximize my gains. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause, and I wish you the best of luck in your search for an apartment in Munich.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 700 Euro per month.

Thank you for your time.

I am looking forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you, Emilia. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. I am pleased to hear that you are looking forward to moving into the apartment. I will send you the necessary paperwork and instructions for the move-in process. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to me. I wish you a pleasant and successful move.
name: Heinrich Heine
